comment: Yep and education spending is closer to $900 billion (in the [2004-05 school year]() K-12 received $536 billion in funding and higher education received $373 billion in funding).The Department of Education is a pretty minor contributor to education spending overall.Corporations dodging taxes is a problem, of course, which is why Obama is proposing corporate tax reform which would include lowering the tax rate to something closer to the effective tax rate and closing a lot of loopholes (which would make it simpler while maintaining revenue).
